Key Match Events: Sean Burke pitched two-hit ball over five innings
Andrew Benintendi tied his career high with his 20th homer
Michael Soroka didn't allow a baserunner while striking out five in three innings
Gus Varland finished a three-hitter, just the seventh shutout for the White Sox
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game started 2 hours, 20 minutes late because of inclement weather
Others: Jackson Jobe, a well-regarded 22-year-old Detroit right-hander, had a hitless three-inning relief stint
In a game that started 2 hours, 20 minutes late because of inclement weather, Ramos homered in the second off Beau Brieske (4-5) and Andrew Vaughn hit an RBI single in the sixth against Ty Madden
Benintendi followed a leadoff walk to Zach DeLoach in the eighth a two-run homer
